casebody.data:
H. WILLIAM KLARE, RECEIVER OF DETROIT BANKERS COMPANY, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 46771] [107 C. Cls. 310;

331 U. S. —]

Damages; rights of receiver of holding company with respect to national bank in receivership. Defendant’s demurrer sustained and plaintiff’s petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court May 5, 1947.
